case.name: In the Matter of Alara Uranium Limited [2007] FCA 724 (14 May 2007)

citation.tocase: Re Insurance Australia Group Ltd [2003] FCA 581 ; (2003) 128 FCR 581
citation.text: 20 Section 723 of the Act does not impose an obligation to lodge a quotation application within seven days of the date of a prospectus. Strictly speaking, read with s 724, it simply attaches certain consequences to the failure to do so. Nevertheless, s 1322(4)(d) has been construed as authorising an extension of the seven day period specified in s 723(3)(b): Re Insurance Australia Group Ltd [2003] FCA 581 ; (2003) 128 FCR 581 at [26] - [29] ; Re Wave Capital Ltd (2003) 47 ACSR 418 at [30]; Re Tony Barlow Australia Ltd (2005) 53 ACSR 1 at [20]-[21]; In the Matter of Geopacific Resources NL (2007) 25 ACLC 226 [16].

20 Section 723 of the Act does not impose an obligation to lodge a quotation application within seven days of the date of a prospectus. Strictly speaking, read with s 724, it simply attaches certain consequences to the failure to do so. Nevertheless, s 1322(4)(d) has been construed as authorising an extension of the seven day period specified in s 723(3)(b): Re Insurance Australia Group Ltd [2003] FCA 581 ; (2003) 128 FCR 581 at [26] - [29] ; Re Wave Capital Ltd (2003) 47 ACSR 418 at [30]; Re Tony Barlow Australia Ltd (2005) 53 ACSR 1 at [20]-[21]; In the Matter of Geopacific Resources NL (2007) 25 ACLC 226 [16].
